content: in all ends being careful to weave in the edge ends on the underside of the roll close to the edge so they will not show congratulations you ve finished your adorable baby sweater abbreviations co = cast on k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together m1 = make one stitch using method given pso = pass stitch over the neighboring stitch yo = yarn over tutorial for kitchener stitch http //www knitty com/issuesummer04/feattheresasum04 html tutorial for three-needle bind-off http //www knitty com/issuefall06/featfall06tt html
